name: Upload large files to Dropbox from new emails in Gmail
description: Effortlessly manage your email attachments with this template! Every time a new email arrives in your Gmail account, Make will automatically upload any large files from that email to your Dropbox. This streamlined workflow ensures that you never lose important documents and keeps your email inbox clutter-free, while providing easy access to your files in the cloud. Perfect for users who frequently receive large attachments and want to maintain organization across their digital workspace.
